member.name: ACTIVATEFLAGS
member.summary: Indicates whether an object is activated as a windowless object. It is used in .

member.name: ACTIVATEFLAGS.ACTIVATE_WINDOWLESS
member.summary: Indicates that the object is activated in place as a windowless object. In the method, the container uses this value returned in the dwFlags parameter instead of calling the method to determine if the object is windowless or not.
